name: Five Nights At Freddy's Sister's Tea Encounter
name_original: Five Nights At Freddy's Sister's Tea Encounter
description:
Overview

An interactable scene made by (Avinash, Armaan, Hayat and Jamal). based on the five nights freddys games. almost 60 % of the objects are interactable in this scene. This was are third submission for are college project in trimester 2.

Controls

  • left  click to interact with an object
  • left click and hold to zoom 

Other

Extract and then  run the  file  using winrar or 7-zip
